<JD_START>
Job Title: Senior Revenue Accountant

Location: Washington DC-Baltimore Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
We are currently hiring for a Fully-Remote Senior Revenue Accountant or Manager opening for a PE-backed SaaS Software company based here in the DC Metro area. This position will be responsible for supporting the revenue accounting function across multiple business units, with a blend of technical accounting revenue recognition/ASC 606 compliance, while driving process improvements and automations.
This opportunity includes a permanent fully remote work schedule, a competitive compensation package and ample room for upward growth and mobility as the company continues to scale
Job ResponsibilitiesSupport monthly revenue close, which includes:Revenue recognition under ASC 606Revenue analysis (moth-over-month, actual to forecast, etc.)Balance sheet reconciliations (deferred revenue and receivables)Allowance reservesOwn contract costs accounting under ASC 340, including monthly expense recognition, balance sheet reconciliation, reporting, and maintain technical documentationAssist with the research and document of technical revenue issues, including contracts with non-standard term, new accounting initiative and business processesAssist with maintaining the revenue recognition policies, including annual review of company’s SSPPartner with our customer-facing teams, finance, collections, and sales operations to ensure proper documentation and recognition of revenue and related transactions in the financial statementsAssist with sales tax related matters, including approving sales tax returns, reconciling billing system to sales tax software and related special projectsEnsure the integrity of key processes by understanding our systems, flow of transactions, internal controls as well as both recommending and participating in implementation of efficiency and effectiveness improvementsSupport annual auditParticipate in special accounting projects, as neededRemain abreast of changes/updates to revenue accounting standards
First Quarter You WillBe introduced to the accounting team and key stakeholders in partner departmentsReceive an overview of Unanet and Unanet’s productsGain an understanding of Unanet’s revenue recognition policies, Unanet’s ERP, and monthly calendarAssist with first closeUnderstand our ASC 340 positions and related reportingUnderstand the due course sales tax reportingGain more comfortability navigating the ERP and running personal reportsOwn specific close responsibilities from start to finishSupport the interim for the annual audit
What we are targeting4+ years of audit experience in public accountingIn-depth experience with software/SaaS revenue recognition under ASC 606Strong ability to recognize problems, gather data, draw valid conclusions, and effectively communicate information to internal stakeholdersAbility to organize and prioritize responsibilities to meet deadlinesCertified Public Accountant (CPA)Bachelor's degree
Nice to Have’sIntermediate Microsoft Excel SkillsCreative and efficiency-mindedAbility to streamline complex business processes and understand segregation of duties/system controls

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
